item.title: 国家大选在即，莫迪在特朗普与农民的争论中支持农民
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）及其执政党利用与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间日益加剧的摩擦，在一次关键的邦选举前争取农民的支持。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his ruling party have seized on growing friction with US President Donald Trump to bolster support from farmers ahead of a crucial state election.】

item.title: Top India Oil Explorer’s Profit Falls on Low Prices, Flat Output
item.description: 由于原油价格下跌和老化油田生产停滞，国营石油和天然气公司的季度利润下降。【原文：State-run Oil and Natural Gas Corp.’s quarterly profit declined on lower crude prices and stagnant production from its aging fields.】

item.title: 恒大清盘人聘请瑞银和中信出售 11 亿美元资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，中国恒大集团的清算人已聘请银行家出售一个物业管理部门，此前的尝试均以失败告终，恒大集团2021年的违约引发了长达数年的房地产债务危机。【原文：Liquidators of China Evergrande Group, the developer whose default in 2021 set off a broader years-long property debt crisis, has hired bankers to sell a property management unit after previous attempts failed, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 日本赤泽表示将在另一场自民党竞选中支持石破茂
item.description: Japan’s chief trade negotiator and Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s right hand man said he’ll support Ishiba if the ruling Liberal Democratic Party calls an early leadership race.

item.title: 印度银行监管局授予支付聚合商牌照后，Paytm 股价大涨
item.description: One 97 Communications Ltd.的股票飙升至三年多来的最高水平，因为该公司的部门获得了印度中央银行的批准，可以作为在线支付聚合商开展业务。【原文：Shares of One 97 Communications Ltd. surged to the highest level in over three years after its unit received approval from India’s central bank to operate as an online payment aggregator.】

item.title: 菲律宾政府称计划在 2026 年借款 470 亿美元
item.description: The Philippine government plans to borrow 2.68 trillion pesos ($47 billion) in 2026, slightly higher than this year’s target, according to the Department of Budget and Management.

item.title: 关税错位综合症与现实相遇
item.description:
通胀、降息和股票创纪录之间的联系并不像看上去的那样。【原文：

The links between inflation, a rate cut, and a record for stocks aren’t what they seem. 

】

item.title: 加拿大对进口菜籽征税后，中国菜籽粕价格大涨
item.description: 在反倾销调查之后，中国政府决定对从头号种植国加拿大进口的油菜籽征税，受此影响，中国菜籽粕价格创下两年来最大涨幅。【原文：Rapeseed meal prices in China jumped the most in two years on supply concerns after Beijing decided to place levies on imports of canola from top grower Canada following an anti-dumping probe.】

item.title: 瑞士可能终止征收房产税，并对木屋征收新税
item.description: 据一项民意调查显示，瑞士很可能会取消已有百年历史的房地产税，并针对山间小屋等第二居所征收新税，以弥补预算缺口。【原文：Switzerland is likely to scrap a century-old tax on real estate and introduce a new levy that will target second homes — such as mountain chalets — to offset any budget shortfalls, according to a poll.】

item.title: 高管在秘密录音中称，进化游戏在被禁市场运营
item.description: 据周一提交给新泽西州法院的一份文件显示，总部位于斯德哥尔摩的在线赌博公司 Evolution AB 的现任和前任高管被秘密拍摄下来，描述其赌场游戏如何非法进入伊朗、苏丹和中国等国家。【原文：Current and former executives at Stockholm-based online gambling company Evolution AB were secretly filmed describing how its casino games made their way illegally to countries such as Iran, Sudan and China, according to a filing submitted to a New Jersey court on Monday.】

item.title: 日本对 5500 亿美元美国基金的投资可能超过 2
item.description: 日本最高谈判代表赤泽亮世周三在接受电视直播采访时表示，作为美国 5500 亿美元基金一部分的日本实际投资率可能高于最初提出的 1-2%。【原文：The rate of actual Japanese investment forming part of a $550 billion US fund could be higher than the 1-2% initially cited, Japan’s top negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said in a live television interview on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本五年期债券销售创 2020 年以来最低需求率
item.description: 日本五年期国债拍卖的需求率低于 12 个月的平均水平，原因是人们再次担心该国债务市场流动性差和波动性大。 该比率为 2020 年以来最低。【原文：Japan’s five-year government bond auction saw a demand ratio that was weaker than the 12-month average amid renewed concerns over poor liquidity and volatility in the nation’s debt market. The ratio was the lowest since 2020.】

item.title: 埃利奥特联营公司最后一刻出价 88.2 亿美元收购 Citgo
item.description: 根据特拉华州法律诉讼程序中提交的一封信，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的一家关联公司在法院下令拍卖 Citgo Petroleum Corp. 母公司的最后一刻提交了一份竞标书。【原文：An Elliott Investment Management affiliate submitted a last-minute bid in the court-ordered auction for Citgo Petroleum Corp.’s parent, according to a letter filed in Delaware legal proceedings.】

item.title: 印度公共部门银行四年后赶超私人贷款机构
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 人工智能乐观情绪升温，台湾股指再创新高
item.description: 受人工智能前景强劲以及美国对主要芯片制造商免除部分关税的影响，台股有望创下历史新高。【原文：Taiwanese shares are on track for a record high, buoyed by a strong outlook for artificial intelligence and exemption from some US tariffs for major chip makers.】

item.title: 凯雷投资的 Orion 啤酒公司据称计划下月在东京上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本啤酒生产商 Orion Breweries Ltd. 正计划最早于下月在东京上市，这距离凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Japanese beer maker Orion Breweries Ltd. is planning its listing in Tokyo as early as next month, according to people familiar with the matter, six years after Carlyle Group Inc. and Nomura Holdings Inc. bought the company.】

item.title: 成本压力持续，澳大利亚人拖欠电费
item.description: 据澳大利亚最大的能源零售商之一称，越来越多的澳大利亚家庭拖欠电费，凸显了经济中挥之不去的生活成本压力。【原文：More Australian households are falling behind on their power bills, according to one of the nation’s biggest energy retailers, highlighting lingering cost-of-living pressures in the economy.】

item.title: 澳大利亚劳动力市场紧张，工资增长保持高位
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的年工资增长率仍然较高，凸显了劳动力市场的紧张和生产力的持续疲软；这是储备银行在寻求控制成本压力时面临的一个关键挑战。【原文：Australia’s annual wage growth remained elevated last quarter, underscoring a tight labor market and persistently weak productivity — a key challenge for the Reserve Bank as it seeks to rein in cost pressures.】

item.title: 日本开始对中国和韩国钢铁产品进行反倾销调查
item.description: 日本将开始对中国和韩国的部分钢铁产品进行反倾销调查，这是日本为保护本国生产商抵御合金进口浪潮而做出的最新努力。【原文：Japan will begin an anti-dumping probe into some Chinese and South Korean steel goods, the latest effort by the nation to protect local producers against a wave of imports of the alloy.】

item.title: 外国购买掩盖了澳大利亚债券的买家疲劳症
item.description: 澳大利亚今年的大规模借贷计划使该国债券市场初显压力，但外国投资者从国债中分散投资的强劲需求掩盖了这一影响。【原文：Australia’s bond market is showing early signs of stress from the nation’s massive borrowing plan this year, but the effect is being obscured by strong demand from foreign investors diversifying from Treasuries.】

item.title: 埃克森希望在圭亚那成功开采石油的基础上在特立尼达和多巴哥再接再厉
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司签署了在特立尼达和多巴哥海岸勘探石油和天然气的协议，这是该公司十年前在附近的圭亚那发现的一代人中世界上最大的石油和天然气。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. signed a deal to explore for oil and gas off the coast of Trinidad and Tobago, a decade after making the world’s largest discovery in a generation in nearby Guyana.】

item.title: Pony AI 接近全年 Robotaxi 目标，尽管存在扩展障碍
item.description: Pony AI Inc. said it was confident it would meet its 2025 robotaxi vehicle output target, while acknowledging it will still take time to commercialize the industry.

item.title: 恒大退市，中国房地产危机再创新低
item.description: 中国恒大集团的退市标志着中国房地产业一个黯淡的里程碑，中国房地产业的瘫痪已进入第四个年头，继续拖累着世界第二大经济体。【原文：China Evergrande Group’s delisting marks a bleak milestone for the nation’s property sector, now in a fourth year of paralysis that continues to weigh down the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 茅台成为红利游戏，收益率超过农业银行
item.description: 尽管经济增长放缓，但贵州茅台酒股份有限公司的股息率首次超过了中国农业银行股份有限公司的股息率，增强了这家高端白酒生产商对收益投资者的吸引力。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co.’s dividend yield has surpassed Agricultural Bank of China Ltd.’s for the first time, boosting the premium liquor maker’s appeal to income investors despite slowing growth.】

item.title: 日本债券市场风险在五年期债券销售前重回焦点
item.description: 日本将于周三拍卖五年期国债，而市场对该国债务市场流动性差和波动性的担忧再度升温。【原文：Japan will auction five-year government bonds Wednesday against the backdrop of renewed concerns over poor liquidity and volatility in the nation’s debt market.】

item.title: 小型车下滑，铃木印度分公司加倍努力发展 SUV
item.description: 印度顶级汽车制造商玛鲁蒂铃木（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd.）正努力应对其主打产品小型车需求的放缓，熟悉该计划的人士称，该公司将推出第二款中型车型，以扩大其 SUV 产品组合。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. is set to expand its SUV portfolio with a second mid-sized model, people familiar with the plan said, as the nation’s top carmaker scrambles to counter slowing demand for its bread-and-butter small cars.】

item.title: 中国动力煤因供热中断创 5 个月新高
item.description: 由于矿区的暴雨中断了煤炭的产出，而城市的酷热又促进了对燃料的降温需求，中国的电厂煤炭价格已升至 3 月份以来的最高水平。【原文：Power plant coal prices in China have risen to the highest level since March, as downpours in mining areas disrupt output and scorching heat in cities boosts cooling demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 SO4 公司从亿万富翁的湖滨路工地出口钾肥
item.description: 由捷克亿万富翁帕维尔-蒂卡克（Pavel Tykac）拥有的澳大利亚钾肥生产商 SO4 表示，该公司已向海外进行了首次商业装运，并计划成为主要的化肥出口商。【原文：SO4, the Australian potash producer owned by Czech billionaire Pavel Tykac, said it made its first commercial shipment overseas and plans to become a major exporter of the fertilizer.】

item.title: 亿万富翁郭台铭的 CDL 在争吵后利润增长乏力
item.description: 这家由新加坡最富有的家族控制的开发商今年上半年的利润略有增长，但这一时期却因一场破坏性的家族争斗而蒙上了阴影。【原文：The Singapore developer controlled by the city-state’s richest clan reported a small increase in profit in the first half of the year, a period overshadowed by a damaging family feud.】

item.title: 通胀数据助推美国降息预期，黄金保持小幅上涨
item.description: 在美国通胀数据符合预期并加强了对下月降息的赌注之后，黄金保持了小幅上涨。【原文：Gold held a modest gain following a US inflation reading that was in line with expectations and reinforced wagers on an interest-rate cut next month.】
